name: customers-api
notes: The Customers API enables you to create and manage customer profiles, as well as search for customers based on various criteria (including customer group membership).

endpoints.name: List customers
endpoints.notes: Lists customer profiles associated with a Square account.

endpoints.name: Create customer
endpoints.notes: Creates a new customer for a business.

endpoints.name: Search customers
endpoints.notes: Searches the customer profiles associated with a Square account using a supported query filter.

endpoints.name: Delete customer
endpoints.notes: Deletes a customer profile from a business. This operation also unlinks any associated cards on file.

endpoints.name: Retrieve customer
endpoints.notes: Returns details for a single customer.
